name: Box Over
description:
Box Over is arcade game. Its an physics based game your job is to stack boxes over and over to gain highest altitude and make a high score.

Use your physics knowledge you have to gain the height.

tip: build stronger base.

Lets see your highscore, show me what you got!

These visuals in the game are inspired by game, FireWatch.

Game uses the Unreal Engine 4. developed by single person. This is my first ever game i packaged and shipped. I am making the game also available on android devices.
